intro: Rod Serling's seminal anthology series focused on ordinary folks who suddenly found themselves in extraordinary, usually supernatural, situations. The stories would typically end with an ironic twist that would see the guilty punished.
card_subtitle: 1959 / 美国 / 剧情 科幻 悬疑 / 罗德·塞林 / 罗德·塞林 Robert McCord
